name: KEM--2018 9th International Conference on Material and Manufacturing Technology
content: The conference is supported by \*National University of Science and Technology, Russia\*, \*Chiang Mai University, Thailand\*, and sponsored by Asia Society of Researchers (ASR). == Paper Publication: All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published in the ICMMT 2018 conference Proceedings as a volume of \*Key Engineering Materials\*.(ISSN: 1662-9795), by TTP. Indexed by \*Elsevier: SCOPUS\* and \*Ei Compendex\*. == Conference Chair: Prof. Vladimir Khovaylo, National University of Science and Technology, Russia; Prof. Ghenadii Korotcenkov, Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology, Korea. == Submission Methods: 1\. Full Paper (Presentation and publication) 2\. Abstract (Presentation only) Please log in the Electronic Submission System(http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icmmt2018) or submit paper to: icmmt@asr.org. == Contact us: Ms. Sharon Chun, Conference Secretary E-mail: icmmt@asr.org. Tel: +1-617-229-6820
